title: Whitespace Wrapping
content:
TEXT1 (160 spaces before → TEXT1 wraps to line 2)

                                                                                                                                                                                                        TEXT2 (200 spaces before → TEXT2 still wraps to line 2, extra spaces hang)

word word word word word word word word word word word word word word word word word                   NEXT (trailing spaces hang, NEXT wraps)

START                    END (spaces in middle of line → visible, no wrap needed)
